channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [GROOVY-5636] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: size==0
item.description:
Problem compiling a Groovy class using the @CompileStatic annotation

https://github.com/glaforge/gaelyk/tree/groovy2

:core:compileGroovy
index problem in /glaforge-gaelyk/core/src/main/groovyx/gaelyk/GaelykCategory.groovy
startup failed:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
So the problem was about spread arguments.
Spread arguments like in foo(*args) are not allowed in static type checking and compilation, as it's impossible to infer the number of arguments in the final call of the method (depends on runtime knowledge).
